colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA DANG 'BREL PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB 'GUG PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BCOM LDAN 'DAS PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YI DAM GYI LHAR 'DZIN PA'I DAD MOS DANG LDAN PA GSOL DPON BLO BZANG TSE RING GIS, ,RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG DANG 'BREL PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GNAD TSAN SNYING BSDUS ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSOD NAMS KHA BTAGS BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BLA MA DAM PA'I ZHABS DRUNG NAS GDAMS PA DU MA'I BKA' DRIN MNOS PA'I GYI NA BA SNGAGS RAMS PA BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN DAR GYIS, ,AAM PAN CHIN WANG SHOG GI DGON SDER BRIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
